boardgame.name: Early American Chrononauts
boardgame.description: Early American Chrononauts is a stand-alone prequel to Chrononauts, also from Looney Labs. The all-new TimeLine begins just before the American Revolution in 1770 and continues through the Civil War, stopping at 1916. As with Chrononauts, players travel through time to change linchpin events, patch paradoxes, and collect artifacts._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This is a stand-alone game, but Early American Chrononauts's TimeLine can fit together with the Chrononauts TimeLine to combine the two games into one huge game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Integrates with:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Chrononauts_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Brand New!! Still in shrinkwrap. Will ship internationally. Looney Labs (LOO 009EA)

Looney Labs (LOO 009EA) The Card Game of 19th Century Time Travel
EAC is a stand-alone expansion for Chrononauts - the card game of time travel. What would have happened if the Boston Tea Party had been prevented, or if Paul Revere_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s midnight riders had been silenced? What if the USA had failed to purchase Louisiana, or if Washington DC hadn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t been burned by the British? What if the Battle of New Orleans had been called off, or if the Alamo had been abandoned and razed before the Mexican army surrounded it? What if Maryland had joined the Confederacy... would the South have won the Civil War? All of these questions and many more will be answered when you play Early American Chrononauts!

Looney Labs (LOO 009EA) The Card Game of 19th Century Time Travel EAC is a stand-alone expansion for Chrononauts - the card game of time travel. Played solitaire once Also have expansion and Chrononauts base game for sale (will combine shipping)

I’ve never had a chance to play this version, though we’ve played and enjoyed the regular Chrononauts, but I just can’t keep them all. It’s in very good condition, with the box having minor corner wear. I’ll charge $8 for shipping within the continental U.S., and shipping cost plus $2 outside the U.S.. I’m selling off most of my games. If you want a list of all I have for sale, just click on my name (Seller: Too Many Games). If you want to buy more than one item, I’ll charge the actual shipping cost plus $2 (to cover costs of the packaging etc.).
You didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t know that Benjamin Franklin was a time traveller? Shame shame! Ships from Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. Buy from Chuck, support the Con!

Looney Labs (LOO 009EA) Early American Chrononauts is a stand-alone prequel to Chrononauts, also from Looney Labs. The all-new TimeLine begins just before the American Revolution in 1770 and continues through the Civil War, stopping at 1916. As with Chrononauts, players travel throught time to change linchpin events, patch paradoxes, and collect artifacts. This is a stand-alone game, but EAC_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s TimeLine can fit together with the Chrononauts TimeLine to combine the two games into one huge game.

Reserved for Pakwan winner of auction: http://www.boardgamegeek.com/geeklist/54424/its-summer-and-davidos-kids-wanna-go-to-camp-auct which closes 5/16/10 see auction listing for full details of description.

Looney Labs (LOO 009EA) Early American Chrononauts is a stand-alone prequel to Chrononauts, also from Looney Labs. The all-new TimeLine begins just before the American Revolution in 1770 and continues through the Civil War, stopping at 1916. As with Chrononauts, players travel throught time to change linchpin events, patch paradoxes, and collect artifacts. This is a stand-alone game, but EAC_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s TimeLine can fit together with the Chrononauts TimeLine to combine the two games into one huge game.
sold to KensterFox in my auction

Looney Labs (LOO059) Time travel moves into another century with Early American Chrononauts, the long-awaited prequel to Chrononauts. Everything you always wanted to do with a time machine: change stuff, collect stuff, save the universe ... now in the 1800_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s. Like the original, it features a 32-card layout depicting the timeline, and crazy Gadgets with special powers. Win by changing the timeline to fit your alternate history goal, by collecting up the all new set of Artifacts, or simply by diligently patching the timeline. Only the packaging has changed for this edition. The game inside the box remains unchanged.
Game is in very good conditions, never played. Please contact me for shipping costs.
